Retrieve ENSEMBL info file

Source: R/getENSEMBLInfo.R
getENSEMBLInfo.Rd

Retrieve species and genome information from http://rest.ensembl.org/info/species?content-type=application/json/.

getENSEMBLInfo()

Examples

info.file <- getENSEMBLInfo()
info.file
#> # A tibble: 162 x 10
#>    accession strain_collecti… release assembly common_name display_name name 
#>  * <chr>     <chr>              <int> <chr>    <chr>       <chr>        <chr>
#>  1 NA        NA                    95 taeGut3… zebra finch Zebra Finch  taen…
#>  2 GCA_0027… NA                    95 AmpOce1… clown anem… Clown anemo… amph…
#>  3 GCA_0007… NA                    95 DMR_v1.0 Damara mol… Damara mole… fuko…
#>  4 GCA_0000… NA                    95 GRCg6a   chicken     Chicken      gall…
#>  5 GCA_0002… NA                    95 LepOcu1  Spotted gar Spotted gar  lepi…
#>  6 GCA_0005… NA                    95 Pman_1.0 Northern A… Northern Am… pero…
#>  7 GCA_0016… NA                    95 Pygocen… red-bellie… Red-bellied… pygo…
#>  8 GCA_0001… NA                    95 Myoluc2… little bro… Microbat     myot…
#>  9 NA        NA                    95 CSAV2.0  Sea squirt… C.savignyi   cion…
#> 10 GCA_0003… NA                    95 MicOch1… vole        Prairie vole micr…
#> # ... with 152 more rows, and 3 more variables: division <chr>, taxon_id <chr>,
#> #   strain <chr>
